name: EduChain
description: ...Revolutionizing Education Through Personalized Learning with Blockchain and AI (MVP). EduChain leverages the power of blockchain and AI to create a dynamic, secure, and rewarding learning experience for all.

name: DesignHubHQ
description: DesignHubHQ is a brand dedicated to providing high-quality website and app design services for clients. Our MVP focuses on streamlining the design process, ensuring clear communication, and delivering exceptional design solutions tailored to our costumers needs.

name: Governator
description:
Governator is a decentralized app (voting platform) 
to: Secure and streamline decision-making processes in Africa. 
Utilize blockchain technology for transparency and anonymity. 
Facilitate governmental electoral processes and institutional decision-making.

name: Confetti-Cuisine
description: Learn how to cook your favorite cuisines.

name: Canvas
description: A HTML and JavaScript based app that allows you to draw and save images with your browser.

name: Upgradeable_Smart_Contract
description: A simple hardhat project that demonstrates how smart contracts are/can be upgraded. The deploy scripts also demonstrates the deployment and verification of multiple smart contracts at once.

name: NFT
description: A Solidity Smart Contract for minting NFTs.
